Terraform Infrastructure Setup

This repository contains the Terraform configuration files to set up and manage our cloud infrastructure.

Table of Contents

  • Prerequisites
  • Getting Started
  • Deploying Infrastructure
  • Destroying Infrastructure
  • Variables and Configurations
  • Contributing
  • License

Prerequisites

  • Terraform v1.x.x (Ensure you have the latest version installed)
  • A configured cloud provider CLI (e.g., AWS CLI, Azure CLI)
  • Properly set up authentication credentials for your cloud provider

Getting Started

  1. Clone this repository: ```bash git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/terraform-infrastructure.git cd terraform-infrastructure
